version_description:
* Added support for DropBox
* Improved iCloud performance
* Added support in the app for downloading iTestMic2 calibration files
* Bug fixes

* Updated for latest iOS devices.
* Removed support for older iOS versions, now requires iOS 8 minimum.
* Added simultaneous background launch protection to prevent problems in iOS 10 when plugging in iTestMic or iPrecisionMic when more than one Stu

Now more modules unlock as Lite versions, ad-supported.
-Bug fixes and stability improvements
-Support for more iOS devices

General
- Added Calibration Error Report link to support page
- Fixed crash on iOS 11 when saving screenshots
- Fixed crashes on iOS 8 and iOS 9
- Fixed issue with multiple Studio Six Digital apps trying to access our accessories
- Updated

-Updated for latest iOS 11 and iPhone X
New! SPL Traffic Light now supports Apple HomeKit! Control a color light from the app to see
-Fixed Restore Purchase function
-Bug fixes and stability improvements

-Added support for iOS 12 and latest iOS devices
-Many bug fixes and stability improvements

-Added Upgrade Calculator to find the best deal to unlock all in-app purchases
-Bug fixes and stability improvements

-Fixed issues with "all-in" upgrades
-Bug fixes and stability improvements

-Fixed issues with storing in-app purchase info
-Bug fixes and stability improvements
-Improved RTA function

-Bug fixes and stability improvements
-Improved uTestMic support
-Changed email sign-up landing page

-Updated for iOS 13
-Fixed issue with setup menu
-Bug fixes and stability improvements

-Bug fixes and stability improvements
-Support for more iOS versions
